articles.title: 'She looks perfect!' Kate Middleton channels Meghan Markle and steps out in white suit - Express
articles.description: KATE MIDDLETON opted for an all-white outfit for today's public appearance. She wore a white suit similar to one worn by Meghan Markle in April.
